description.value: Unlike other undead, a jiang-shi isn't destroyed at 0 HP. Instead, they fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Unconscious] and awaken in 1 minute with 1 Hit Point. Scattering at least 1 Bulk of glutinous rice or hen eggs on an unconscious jiang-shi destroys them permanently. If the jiang-shi was reduced to 0 HP by an attack from a weapon made of darkwood, they're destroyed immediately.
